sentences.en: After a couple of whiskies my head felt all muzzy.
sentences.cn: 我喝了两杯威士忌,就昏头昏脑的了.

sentences.en: After a couple of wines my head felt all muzzy.
sentences.cn: 我喝了两杯酒就昏头昏脑的了.

sentences.en: All of a sudden he felt less muzzy and his heart missed a beat.
sentences.cn: 这么一想,他忽然的不那么昏昏沉沉的了,心中仿佛凉了一下.

sentences.en: He sat up, his head muzzy with the dream, his cheeks salty, tear - stained.
sentences.cn: 他满脸泪痕, 咸咸的.他坐起来, 脑海里还懵懵懂懂地萦绕着那个梦.

sentences.en: Juliet’s head felt muzzy , and she hoped she hadn’t a cold coming on.
sentences.cn: 朱丽叶感到脑袋昏昏沉沉的，她希望不会是得了感冒。

sentences.en: Those drugs made me feel muzzy.
You speak with muzzy consecution. Though they are penetrating judgment, they can't be understood.
sentences.cn: 你说话的理路不清, 尽管是真知灼见, 却不能为人理解.

words.tran_cn: 无精神的；迷糊的；发呆的

trans.tran_cn: 模糊的，不清晰的，迷糊的， 昏头昏脑的
trans.tran_en: unable to think clearly especially because you are ill, sleepy, or drunk
